Regulation Name(s): Multipurpose System For In Vitro Coagulation Studies
Analyte(s): Whole blood hemostasis parameters (R, MA, LY30)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Citrated: K, KH, RTH, FFH assay cartridge and TEG 6s Hemostasis System for in vitro coagulation and hemostasis evaluation using thromboelastography
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro diagnostic evaluation of blood hemostasis properties in adult patients, including those with possible heparin/heparinoid presence and increased risk of coagulopathy, to assess hemorrhage or thrombosis before, during, and after cardiovascular surgery, procedures, or liver transplantation; usable in laboratory or point-of-care settings
